title: Donut Shop App & Dashboard
description: I built this full stack Donut Shop e-commerce app using AWS Amplify along with an integratable React.js dashboard for the donut shop to receive a user's order from the app in real time. Users can check out new menu items, order donuts to pick up in store, and sign up for donut rewards.

title: Century 21 Website
description: I built this website using React Native Web with Expo Router. It features • File-based navigation bar • A Screen to display the realtor's current homes for sale • Navigation to link the user to the IDX(Internet Data Exchange) on Century 21's website • And a section that displays customer reviews.

title: Airbnb Clone App
description: I created a clone of the popular Airbnb platform using React Native. It features a functional UI that mimics the 2022 Airbnb interface, with features such as • Google autocomplete search • Image carousel w/ pagination • Google Maps functionality to select an Airbnb on the map based on price • OpenAI API integration prompting ChatGPT to act as a chatbot for guest property recommendations.

title: UberEats Clone App
description: A full stack React Native app inspired by the UberEats user app. I utilized AWS Amplify's datastore to configure the back end to query and save customer's orders and used Amazon Cognito for user registration, authentication, & account recovery.

title: Hotel UI
description: A React Native UI design I created to reimagine the hotel Aston Waikiki Beach's website into a cross platform mobile app. I used most of the content and images from their current website and utilized both Bottom Tabs, Drawer navigation and other React Native libraries for a smooth UX.
